title: Art and perception: learning to see
brief_description: The viewer is encouraged to look for the visual elements of art- colour, line, texture and form- as the film explores different settings: the country, the city and the seashore. Presents a variety of paintings of these environments that illustrate the visual inspiration and imaginative inventiveness the artist brought to his subject. No other credits available.
